Keywords: Battleworld: Other , Cosmic , Fantastic Four , Latveria
Real Name: Franklin Richards
Special Powers
MY THOUGHTS AND DESIRES COME TO FRUITION: FREE: Choose one: If 5 of less of Franklin Von Doom's generated terrain markers are on the map, generate a terrain marker (hindering, water or blocking) in an adjacent square -or- Remove all terrain markers except Debris from a square within range and line of fire.
MOLECULAR MANIPULATION: Incapacitate, Telekinesis.
WANT TO SAVE YOURSELF SOME TIME AND GIVE UP?: STOP. (Power Cosmic Team Ability), (Colossal Symbol), Impervious.
REALITY WARP: Probability Control. Outwit, but only when Franklin Von Doom occupies a terrain marker.

Comments
May 21, 2021
Goop
Really cool design. Either your opponent ignores him and has to cope with Prob/Outwit double target incap from 9 range the whole game.... Or they decide to attack him and have to deal with a massive 13/20/5 killer with a double stop click. Note though that he creates markers adjacent and you still have to move to them to get outwit effect. Thats kind of a pain.
August 5, 2020
Maxphyte
Quite possibly my favorite figure to play of the sets released this year.

UltimateThunderGod
This figure has the flight symbol, not the boot symbol.

GL_Alex
My number one want from the set. Franklin is going to hit that 20 defense Stop click and go all Galactus style powerful on his opponents. A must have on FF teams.
